title: Exquisite Diamond Vaddanam (Belt) with Emerald and Pearl Accents
materials: meticulously studded with brilliant-cut Diamonds (approx. 14.30 carats). Features a central Pear-shaped Ruby (approx. 4.70 carats)
accented by lustrous Emeralds (approx. 9.23 carats) and dangling South Sea Pearls (approx. 23.95 carats) for added elegance.
features: This Vaddanam showcases intricate floral and paisley motifs, intricately set with sparkling diamonds. The design includes a central large Emerald stone that is a unique design element to this Vadannem. Dangling South Sea Pearls add a touch of classic grace. The craftsmanship reflects traditional South Indian jewelry making with its elaborate patterns and emphasis on gemstone brilliance.
colors: complemented by the vibrant green of the Emerald and the rich red of the Ruby. The soft luster of the pearls adds a delicate contrast.
occasions: traditional ceremonies (like Seemantham or Half-Saree Function)
and grand celebrations. Its modern elegance also makes it suitable for high-end fashion events and parties.
description: This Vaddanam is a statement piece that seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern elegance. The combination of diamonds, rubies, emeralds and pearls makes it an heirloom-worthy treasure. Its exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design ensure it will be cherished for generations.
